long_description: Pick up this Soto Muka maintenance kit to keep your Soto Muka liquid-fuel stove operating at peak performance. Kit includes two P-34 O-rings, one S-3 O-ring, one 13.8 x 2mm O-ring, a backflow prevention valve unit, a backflow prevention valve spring, pump filter and a multitool. Also includes a pump shaft gasket and silicone grease. Soto Muka stove sold separately.
short_description: Pick up this Soto Muka maintenance kit to keep your Soto Muka liquid-fuel stove operating at peak performance.
